title: Iconic Tour de France downhills will stay: ‘We will not eliminate the final descents’
content:
Stakeholders straddle line between enhancing safety and protecting the essence of bike racing: 'We do not want to end up having bike races in parking lots of big supermarkets.'

Read the full article at Iconic Tour de France downhills will stay: ‘We will not eliminate the final descents’ on Velo.
author: ahood
